recipesJson.name: lumi-tropic yumyum
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Add sweeter if you are that kinda mixer.... Blah blahhh blahhhhhh blahhhh blahh blabblab blabiddyblab P.S I vape on a 5 mm 14 strand Celtic single coil on the DROP rda

reviews.text: This mix is super good. I subbed in FA Indian mango at 1 for the FLV mango and I subbed in TPA Papaya at 3 for the cantaloupe.
